mapper.select: select userid, intro, care_type, desired_wage, cctv, hit from teacher where userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: update teacher set intro = #{intro} where userid = #{userid}
update teacher set desired_wage = #{desired_wage} where userid= #{userid}
update teacher set pic = #{pic} where userid= #{userid}
update teacher set child_age=#{age_list} where userid= #{userid}
update teacher set care_type= #{care_type} where userid= #{userid}
update teacher set cctv= #{cctv} where userid= #{userid}
mapper.select: select exp_content, to_char(exp_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as exp_start, to_char(exp_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as exp_end from experience where userid= #{userid}
mapper.update: update experience set exp_content = #{exp_content}, exp_start = #{exp_start}, exp_end= #{exp_end} where userid= #{userid}
update teacher set hit= hit+1 where userid= #{userid}
